entry.title: Permania (sodium bromate free ) Lash lift Kit ( includes glue and lift pads)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Toronto Lash Supplies
Type:
Price: 89.99

Permania’s newest line of sodium bromate free lash lift kit! 
Each set has one box of perm and one box of neutralizer- each box includes 10 individual sachets 

Instructions: both steps can be left on average lashes for 7-8 mins ; for thicker lashes they can be left on for 8-10 mins 

Ingredient List :

First Step ( Perming) water , ethanlamine thioglycolate, mineral oil, cetearyl alcohol, glyceryl stearate, proplene glycol, ethanolamine, PEG-100 Stearate, cetrimonium chloride, petrolatum, sorbitan sesquioleate, hydrolyzed collagen, etidronic acid, fragrance 

Second Step ( Neutralizer): cetearyl alcohol, mineral oil, hydrogen peroxide, sodium laureth sulfate, bethentrimonium chloride, glyceryl sterate, ceteth-20, disodium phosphate, disodium EDTA, phosphoric acid, fragrance, phenacetin

entry.title: Keratin Lash Gel
entry.summary:
Vendor: TLS
Type: Lash Extension Product
Price: 15.00

This is an after care product to sell to clients after a lash lift! Our keratin lash mascara provides nourishing and hydrating effects post lash lift. Advise clients to apply this keratin gel to lifted lashes daily in order to keep the lashes healthy and nourished

Ingredients: water, keratinn, portulaca olercea extract, helianthus annuus seed oil, tirethanolamine, sodium hylauronate, hydroxybenzyl ester

﻿How to use: ﻿this product comes in a mascara like tube and wand, please ask clients to use once per day after lash lift procedure. It is easy to use and applies like a clear mascara gel to help nourish the lifted lashes. 

Suggested Retail Price : $49.99

entry.title: Vitamin Lash Conditioner
entry.summary:
Vendor: TLS
Type: Lash Lift
Price: 19.99

This is and add on after care treatment for lash lifts! Our deep lash conditioner contains vitamin A, B as well as B5 which is proven to replenish permed lashes right away with nutrients.It provides extra nourishing, hydration and conditioning effects for lifted lashes. Please apply to lashes after the the second step and before tinting. *please note this product may contains traces of nuts, please make sure your client does not have alon, macadamia or avocado allergy before using this product. 

How to use:Leave the lash conditioner for 3-5 mins and then wash off with q-tip and water before tinting lashes and after step one and two. 

Ingredients: aquam, hydrolyzed keratin protein, hydrolyzed jojoba protein,m hydrolyzed wheat protein, hydrolyzed baobab protein, sweet almond oil, macadamia nut oil, avocado oil, hyaluronic acid, stearic acid, oleic acid, vitamin a, vitamin b, provitamin b5

entry.title: Toronto Lash Supplies Instant Lash and Brow Keratin Lift Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: TLS
Type:
Price: 89.99

Our very own keratin lash lift kit is finally here- sodium bromate free! 

Extremely quick processing times* (5-7 mins for step 1,2 and 2 mins for step 3)

  This kit features air tight pump bottles for each solution. Air tight pump bottles are the newest form of packaging for lash lift kits!  Solutions are packaged in an air tight pump bottle allowing solutions to have a much longer shelf life ( even after opening), zero chances of contamination and reduces waste ( unlike individual packages of each solution) 

Timing for Lash Lift:

step 1 : 6-7 mins for average lashes, up to 9 mins for thick lashes

step 2: 7-8 mins for average lashes , up to 10 mins for thick lashes 

step 3- 3 mins 

Each Kit Includes

1 Lash lift Glue

1 lifting lotion in air pump bottle

1 setting lotion in air pump bottle

1 nourishing lotion in air pump bottle

5 pairs shields (small and medium)

3 y  combs

For brow lifting*

Instructions:
- Clean the eyebrow area
- Apply glue on any unruly hairs using a brush to brush the hairs up.
- Carefully Apply step 1 Lifting on the eyebrows avoiding the skin around
- Leave on for 3- 5min
- Remove Step 1 with a dry cotton pad
- Apply step 2 Fixing on the eyebrows avoiding the skin around.
- Leave on for 3-5 min
- Remove step 2 with a dry cotton pad
- Apply Step 3 Nourish on the eyebrows
- Leave on for 3-5 min
- Remove step 3 with a dry cotton pad
- Style eyebrows to your liking ( wax, trim etc)

Ingredients: 

Step 1: ﻿water , thioglycolate, ethanolamine, cetearyl alcohol, oleth-30, ammonia, pentasodium pentetate

Step 2: water, sodium stannate, cetearyl alcohol, hedp, hydrogen peroxide, disodium phosphate

Step 3: water, keratin, portulaca oleracea extract, sophora flavescens root extract, helianthus annus seed oil , triethanolamine, sodium hyaluronate, hydroxy benzyl ester. 

Glue : water, polyvinyl phenoxyethanol, ethylhexylglycerin, PEG 40 hydrogenated castor oil, glycerin

entry.title: Refectocil lash tint
entry.summary:
Vendor: refectocil
Type:
Price: 18.99 - 19.99 (5 variants)

Perfect for eyebrow and eyelash tinting, must be used in combination with refectocil 3% oxidant

﻿Ingredients:﻿Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Toluene-2,5-Diamine, m-Aminophenol, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, 2,4-Diaminophenoxyethanol, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, CI 77499.

﻿How to Use: ﻿mix a penny sized tint with one drop of oxidant to activate color, brush onto lashes or brows with qtip and leave on for 5 mins before removing.
